name: Horror Tooth
description:
Horror-tooth is a first person Sci-fi horror game, where you must manipulate light to escape a vicious beast. 

For the ultimate experience: 

- Play at 60 fps.
- Wear good quality headphones.
- Play in a dark room. 

Players who "complete the game in Normal mode" will be listed on a board. 
Players who "complete the game in BRUTAL mode" will be listed on a board. 

Controls are listed within the games menu screen.

Please leave feedback we would love to hear what you think!

Join my discord to hear all the latest news about the game and other things. https://discord.gg/QJQwCMX
